long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Wiingy Tutor Mate, your dedicated companion for a seamless tutoring experience! Wiingy Tutor Mate is a powerful Chrome extension designed exclusively for Wiingy Tutors, providing you with a range of valuable features to enhance your tutoring journey. Our mission is to empower tutors like you by simplifying scheduling, improving communication, and optimizing your valuable time.

With Wiingy Tutor Mate, you'll discover a one-stop solution that not only streamlines your tutoring schedule but also ensures real-time updates and a supportive environment. We understand the importance of efficiency, privacy, and a positive experience for both you and your students. That's why Tutor Mate is built to be intuitive, reliable, and focused on your needs. Some of the key features with which we are piloting the extension are: 

Real-Time Availability:
Stay on top of your tutoring schedule with ease! Our extension allows you to update your real-time availability internally to the Wiingy Team. Keep your calendar up-to-date, making it convenient for students to book sessions based on your open slots, enhancing the utilization of your free time, with new opportunities. 

Real-Time Participant Status:
This extension provides the Wiingy Team with instant updates on student and tutor joining status, which allows us to be on top of any kind of delays from the student's end or the tutor's end. We can give honest and data-driven feedback about any kind of delay to the students or tutors, enhancing the overall experience for all the stakeholders.
